alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan; Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 4:28PM CDT until August 28 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN KINGFISHER...SOUTHWESTERN NOBLE...NORTHWESTERN LOGAN...WEST CENTRAL PAYNE AND SOUTHEASTERN GARFIELD COUNTIES... At 428 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Mulhall to 4 miles northwest of Crescent to 5 miles southeast of Bison, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crescent, Covington, Marshall, Mulhall, Orlando, Douglas, Lake Carl Blackwell, Lovell, Lake Mcmurtry, Lucien and Hayward. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
